subject: Re: [junit] Bug in JUnit Swing UI
msgSnippet: ... If I remember well I explored how to implement a Project functionality within JUnit and wanted to add some menus for that.  That s how I found the bug
messageBody:
> Thanks, that fixed it! I'm curious. That problem is pretty well hidden
> unless you add menus to JUnit. How was this problem originally discovered?

If I remember well I explored how to implement a "Project" functionality
within JUnit and wanted to add some menus for that. That's how I found
the bug and yes I did send a patch for it.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Bossicard
